title: Amazing Light! 3B 2.5 Ba Duplex
posting_body: Rare 3 BR/2.5 Bath duplex on beautiful tree lined street in Lakeview in the Burley School District.
Unique architectural design maximizes natural light.
Open floor plan downstairs with private bedrooms upstairs.
Hardwood floors, granite countertops, and stainless steel throughout.
Private rooftop deck off the master bedroom with beautiful views.
Another private deck off the dining room on the main floor.
Screens doors offer fresh air in spring summer and fall.
Natural wood burning fireplace creates a cozy winter space in the family room.
The main floor also has a separate laundry room with space for storage.
Master bath has deep jacuzzi tub underneath a large skylight.
Walking distance to Diversey and Wellington "L" stations.
Central Heat and AC throughout.
2 garage spots for an additional $125 each per month.
Fenced in backyard with new turf and fire pit for year round use.
The details:
Burley School District
Roof Deck with Lake Views
Bicycle Storage
Covered Garage Parking Available
Central Heat / AC
In-Unit Washer / Dryer
Pet Friendly
Click here for a video tour: https://youtu.be/offuBY96KZ0
